name: G.A.M.E
description:
Play as an employee of a game development company, AE, as you work inside their special operating system G.A.M.E to guide the development of their games, as well as make executive decisions on how to approach random events such as robberies and cookie vendors.

This game was made in 72 hours for the LD Jam #33, by a team of three, known as FlamingKiwi.

Ludum Dare game page : http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=57508

The font was created by http://www.dafont.com/pixel-art.font under the CC 3.0 license, shown here: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/.

Please note that Unity Web Player no longer works on Chrome due to lack of NP-API support.
